feed.title: Pinchflat Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Pinchflat: v2024.6.25
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Dev] Upgrade to Elixir 1.17.0 by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/289
  • [Dev] Reduce config file clutter by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/290
  • [Bugfix] Check for regex errors before saving a source by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/296

Small one this time but I wanted to get it out there since I'm leaving for a few weeks! I'll be back soon enough üòé

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/compare/v2024.6.10...v2024.6.25

entry.title: New release for Pinchflat: v2024.7.16
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Updates yt-dlp to v2024.07.09. This may resolve a 403 error some users were seeing
  • [Enhancement] Improve flow for adding many sources at once by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/306
  • This switches the position of the Source URL and Custom Name fields. Sorry if that breaks muscle memory!
  • [Enhancement] Render URL attributes as a link by @breakid in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/299
  • [Enhancement] Download image when using playlists with media center apps by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/313
  • [Enhancement] Capture playlist_index for use with output templates by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/315
  • Only for use with playlists that aren't likely to change
  • [Enhancement] Add improved output template options for media center apps by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/318
  • [Dev] Improve first-time development experience by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/304
  • [Dev] add date to log entries by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/305

New Contributors

  • @breakid made their first contribution in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/299

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/compare/v2024.6.25...v2024.7.16

entry.title: New release for Pinchflat: v2024.7.18
entry.content:
‚ö†Ô∏è IMPORTANT ‚ö†Ô∏è

Starting in the next version of Pinchflat, changing the cutoff date of a source will delete media from before that cutoff date.

In other words, if you update a source to have a cutoff date of March 1st then all media from BEFORE March 1st will be deleted.

What's Changed

  • [Enhancement] Added additional output template for playlists used with media center apps by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/319
  • [Bugfix] Determine NFO season and episode from filepath by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/320
  • [Enhancement] Add zero-padding to playlist_index output template option by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/321
  • [Enhancement] Support auto-generated subs when embedding subs in media file by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/324
  • [Dev] Fix CI caching by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/325

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/compare/v2024.7.16...v2024.7.18

entry.title: New release for Pinchflat: v2024.7.30
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Enhancement] Media from before a source's cutoff date is now automatically deleted by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/329
  • [Enhancement] Ignore media based on user scripts by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/330
  • [Performance] Asyncronously delete sources and media profiles by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/277
  • Bumped yt-dlp version

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/compare/v2024.7.18...v2024.7.30
